original_text: Jesus and his disciples were eating supper. The Devil had already put an idea into the mind of Judas Iscariot, Simon's son. The idea was to sell Jesus to his enemies.
korean_text: 마귀가 벌써 시몬의 아들 가룟 유다의 마음에 예수를 팔려는 생각을 넣었더라

sentences.original_text: Jesus and his disciples were eating supper
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님과 그의 제자들이 저녁 식사를 하고 있었다

sentences.original_text: The Devil had already put an idea into the mind
The idea was to sell Jesus
